title: Balance, dizziness and proprioception in patients with chronic whiplash associated disorders complaining of dizziness: A prospective randomized study comparing three exercise programs - PubMed
author: Username
description: Between and within group comparisons suggest that physiotherapist led neck exercise groups including a behavioural approach had advantages in improving measures of dizziness compared with the general physical activity group, although many still complained of dizziness and balance impairment. cleaned_text: Balance, dizziness and proprioception in patients general physical activity (PPA) group. Pre intervention, 3, 6 and 12 months post baseline they completed the University of California Los Dizziness Questionnaire (UCLA-DQ), Visual Analogue Scales (VAS) for, during activity and physical measures (static and dynamic clinical balance tests and head repositioning accuracy (HRA)). Results: There were significant time by changes over time changes in most variables within compared the general physical activity group, although many reserved.
